verses.text: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O \sc Lord\sc*.
Lord, hear my voice: Let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.
If thou, \sc Lord\sc*, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand?
But \add there is\add* forgiveness with thee, That thou mayest be feared.
I wait for the \sc Lord\sc*, my soul doth wait, And in his word do I hope.
My soul \add waiteth\add* for the Lord More than they that watch for the morning: \add I say, more than\add* they that watch for the morning.
Let Israel hope in the \sc Lord\sc*: For with the \sc Lord\sc* \add there is\add* mercy, And with him \add is\add* plenteous redemption.
And he shall redeem Israel From all his iniquities.
